statements: SELECT * FROM safety_incident_reports;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM safety_incident_reports;
SELECT description, reporter FROM safety_incident_reports WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM safety_incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT location, status FROM safety_incident_reports WHERE reporter = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM safety_incident_reports WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, location, status FROM safety_incident_reports WHERE location = 'Factory A' AND status = 'Resolved';
SELECT * FROM safety_incident_reports WHERE reporter LIKE '%John%' OR reporter LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM safety_incident_reports WHERE description ILIKE '%fire%' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents, status FROM safety_incident_reports GROUP BY status HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM Safety_Incident_Reports;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM Safety_Incident_Reports WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT description, incident_date, location FROM Safety_Incident_Reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Investigations WHERE investigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name, findings FROM Investigations WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Safety_Incident_Reports;
SELECT incident_id, location, description FROM Safety_Incident_Reports WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT incident_id, location, description, severity FROM Safety_Incident_Reports WHERE location LIKE 'Warehouse%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location, description, severity FROM Safety_Incident_Reports WHERE severity BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT i.investigation_id, i.incident_id, i.investigator_name, i.investigation_date, s.location, s.description FROM Investigations i JOIN Safety_Incident_Reports s ON i.incident_id = s.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM SafetyIncidentReports
SELECT incident_id, incident_date FROM SafetyIncidentReports WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT * FROM Investigators WHERE department_name = 'HR'
SELECT investigator_name, department_name FROM Investigators ORDER BY investigator_name DESC
SELECT status_name FROM IncidentStatus
SELECT * FROM SafetyIncidentReports ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, employee_id, incident_description FROM SafetyIncidentReports WHERE employee_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM Investigators WHERE department_name = 'HR'
SELECT incident_date, incident_description FROM SafetyIncidentReports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT SafetyIncidentReports.incident_id, Investigators.investigator_name, IncidentStatus.status_name FROM SafetyIncidentReports JOIN Investigators ON SafetyIncidentReports.employee_id = Investigators.investigator_id JOIN IncidentStatus ON SafetyIncidentReports.incident_id = IncidentStatus.status_id
SELECT * FROM safety_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT incident_id, location FROM safety_incidents WHERE location='Warehouse'
SELECT incident_description FROM safety_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM incident_reports JOIN investigation_details ON incident_reports.report_id = investigation_details.report_id WHERE investigation_status='In Progress'
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM incident_categories
SELECT * FROM safety_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, location FROM safety_incidents;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT report_id, incident_id, reported_by FROM incident_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT i.incident_id, i.incident_description, r.report_date, d.investigator_name FROM safety_incidents i JOIN incident_reports r ON i.incident_id = r.incident_id JOIN investigation_details d ON r.report_id = d.report_id WHERE d.investigation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT * FROM safety_incident_reports;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM safety_incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) FROM safety_incident_reports GROUP BY department;
SELECT i.investigator, ii.findings FROM incident_investigations ii JOIN investigators i ON ii.investigator = i.name;
SELECT department, location FROM departments WHERE department_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM safety_incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC, department ASC
SELECT description FROM safety_incident_reports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT i.name, d.location FROM investigators i JOIN departments d ON i.department = d.name
SELECT * FROM incident_investigations ii LEFT JOIN investigators i ON ii.investigator = i.name WHERE i.department = 'Safety'
SELECT DISTINCT type_name FROM incident_types
